data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 4,047,779 lost in Hardoi that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hardoi, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Hardoi that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Hardoi, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 3,998,120 who are far from you in Hardoi, Uttar Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Hardoi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Aghori people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Hardoi that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 4,092,800 people living in the county of Hardoi.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hardoi, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 4,092,800.

We estimate Hardoi has 45,021 people who might know Jesus, 49,659 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,998,120 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Hardoi, Uttar Pradesh, India will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
